channel.title: [Bat]Wierd Weapon Fix Please[508]
channel.description: hello, im nathan :D The other day i downloaded batscape to find out that my vls and statius hammer will not hit high at all they do not hit above 20.... Is there any way to fix this without making the weapons stats super high?

item.title: [Bat]Wierd Weapon Fix Please[508]
item.dc:creator: @Nathan8888 Nathan8888
item.description:
@Nathan8888 wrote:

Davidi2:

If you change the weapon stats it will work, why don’t you want to do that. You can just change their strength bonus’s. If not, it will be a lot more complicated. Well, not a LOT more, but too much more for me to explain it.

You got msn :D?

Read full topic
